title: bcAnalyze3 Light 1.3.6 – High resolution bat call recordings

title: Live Performer 1.0.1 – Audio Unit Host that captures music inspiration

title: Client Folder Maker 5.0 – Quickly make folder structures

title: XSTab 2.0 – Generate guitar tabs
content: XSTab is a tool designed to assist guitar players to find out what is really played in an Audio File focusing on classical guitar music pieces. title: Pop Dot Comics 2.14 – Create comic-book illustrations from your photos
content: Pop Dot Comic is a fun way to create comic-book style illustrations from your snapshot or ones taken of your friends and family. title: Image Enhance Pro 5.2 – Enhance color and details of your photos
